title: Mile Zero Fight Night at 24 North
seo_title: Mile Zero Fights at 24 North Hotel Key West
more_content:
Set your calendars for fight night at 24 North Hotel!

Our recently-opened multipurpose Sunset Green Event Lawn has already played host to a brew fest, a recent Michael McDonald concert and now the MMA-style Mile Zero Fight 3 on April 21.

Sponsored by real estate company “Buy the Keys,” the event will run from 6-10 p.m. with food, drinks and more. Mile Zero Fight 3 will feature local Key West fighters competing with mixed martial arts.

The day before the fight, April 20, fighters will attend a weigh-in poolside at 24 North. Guests can meet the fighters and mingle poolside. Enjoy food or a cocktail at our onsite restaurant, The Toasted Coconut.

The big Mile Zero Fight 3 follows the weigh-in on Saturday, April 21 at 6 p.m.

Tickets for the event start at $35 and are available for purchase on the Mile Zero Fight website.

Make sure to check out our Mile Zero Fights package for this special event and enjoy a 20% discount off your entire stay in key West! Details here.

24 North is pleased to play host for the event at the Sunset Green Event Lawn, which officially opened December 30. The space was created to host large-scale events with a capacity of nearly 1,200. 24 North looks forward to hosting family reunions, weddings and more in this open-air space in the coming months.

--

Booking a stay in Key West? Check out specials at 24 North Hotel.
short_description: Mile Zero Fight 3 will feature local Key West fighters competing in mixed martial arts.
